name: Lair of the God Gamer
description:
A MOONMOON_OW Game Jam 2019 Entry

Gameplay:

    Can you get past The Riddler and defeat The God Gamer in his lair?
    If so, congratulations you have now taken its title as god gamer.

Movement:

    Directionl Arrow Keys + Space Bar
        (shoots with space bar; moves and jumps with arrow keys)
